hero.title: Molecular Genetics Lab
hero.subtitle: Cutting-edge science in the heart of Patagonia

description.title: Patagonian Research Laboratory
description.subtitle: Cutting-edge science in the heart of Patagonia
description.text: Our laboratory is dedicated to scientific research of excellence in the Patagonian ecosystem. We develop interdisciplinary studies ranging from molecular biology to ecosystem ecology, contributing to the knowledge and conservation of one of the most important regions on the planet. With a focus on sustainability and innovation, we work to generate scientific solutions that benefit both the local community and the international scientific community.

1.title: Climate change impact on Patagonian biodiversity

2.title: New endemic species discovered in the region

3.title: Soil conservation techniques in arid zones

1.title: Congresses
1.description: Active participation in international scientific conferences

3.title: Science Dissemination
3.description: Communication of results to the community

banner.title: Cookie Usage
banner.message: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website. You can accept all cookies or customize your preferences.

page.title: Cookie Policy
page.description: Information about cookie usage on our website
page.whatAreCookiesText: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help us remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience.
page.essentialText: Necessary for the basic functioning of the website.
page.analyticsText: Help us understand how users interact with our site.
page.resetText: You can reset your cookie preferences at any time by clicking the button below.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introText: At Lab Patagonia, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacy.dataCollectionText: We collect information that you provide directly to us, such as when you contact us or subscribe to our newsletter.
privacy.dataUseText: We use your data to improve our services, communicate with you, and fulfill our legal obligations.
privacy.dataProtectionText: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data.
privacy.contactText: If you have questions about this policy, you can contact us at info@labpatagonia.com

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.acceptanceText: By accessing and using this website, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.
terms.useOfSiteText: This website is provided solely for informational and educational purposes related to our research activities.
terms.intellectualPropertyText: All content on this website, including texts, images, and designs, is protected by copyright.
terms.liabilityText: Lab Patagonia shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, or consequential damages that may arise from the use of this website.
terms.modificationsText: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will take effect immediately upon posting.
